meanings.definition: A boat fitted for use as a dwelling.
meanings.sent1: The houseboat floated peacefully on the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: We spent the weekend living on a cozy houseboat.
meanings.sent3: The houseboat had a tiny garden on its deck.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of life, we are all passengers on our own houseboats.
meanings.sent5: The colorful houseboat bobbed up and down with the waves.

meanings.definition: A boat that serves as a residence.
meanings.sent1: The houseboat was moored by the dock, ready for its occupants.
meanings.sent2: Living on a houseboat allows you to be close to nature.
meanings.sent3: The houseboat community organized a floating party.
meanings.sent4: Her houseboat was a sanctuary away from the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The houseboat gently rocked us to sleep at night.
